project.description: Perform a fleetctl command on ALL template unit files for <SERVICE>@.service

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FLEET_UNIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the fleet unit. e.g.: marathon@.service --> marathon

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -z $FLEET_UNIT ] || [ $FLEET_UNIT = "" ]; then exit 1 fi
echo "${SSHCMD} \"fleetctl list-units|grep ${FLEET_UNIT}|awk '{print \$1}'\""
eval ${SETUPKEYS} for unit in $(eval "${SSHCMD} \"fleetctl list-units|grep ${FLEET_UNIT}|awk '{print \$1}'\""); do eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl ${COMMAND} ${unit}'" done
